location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a note from Hussun Ben Rahman [Hasan bin Rahma], chief of the Joasemee [Qasimi] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Note announcing that Abdoolla ben Mohomed [Abdullah bin Muhammed] will negotiate with Bruce in person as correspondence between himself and Bruce has not resolved their conflict. The note is recorded as having been received on 30 November 1816.
